sentences.sContent: The first edition was published in 1765.
They are publishing the dictionary on CD-ROM.
sentences.sCn: 那部词典他们将以光盘版的形式推出。

sentences.sContent: We love reading your letters and we try to publish as many as possible
sentences.sCn: 我们喜欢阅读大家的来信，并且会尽量刊登出来。

sentences.sContent: The latest unemployment figures will be published tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 最新的失业数字将于明天公布。

words.tran: 出版；发行（publish的现在分词形式）；发表

trans.tranOther: to arrange for a book, magazine etc to be written, printed, and sold
